abstract: The reinsurer Transatlantic says it has begun deal negotiations with a unit of Berkshire Hathaway, officially adding a third party to the takeover fray.
snippet: The reinsurer Transatlantic says it has begun deal negotiations with a unit of Berkshire Hathaway, officially adding a third party to the takeover fray.
lead_paragraph: Transatlantic Holdings said on Friday that it had begun deal discussions with a unit of Berkshire Hathaway, officially adding a third party to the competition for the reinsurance company.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
